main event: A reddish white disk was observed over Santiago, Chile, on December 3, 1965, exploding into six fragments.
interesting points: The object was seen by the Chilean Rocket Society and high school students., The object initially appeared reddish white and exploded into fragments., Observers used binoculars for a clearer view., The sighting lasted for a short duration and occurred in the early evening., The object was reported to be in a descending state throughout the observation.
witness description: Chilean Rocket Society and high school students
